document.full_text: a french search team has lifted 75 bodies to the surface in recent days from the sunken wreckage of an air france airliner which crashed into the atlantic ocean off brazil two years ago, killing everyone on board.
document.title: search teams pull 75 bodies from rio-paris wreckage
lines_and_colors: a french search team has lifted 75 bodies to the surface in recent days from the sunken wreckage of an air france airliner which crashed into the atlantic ocean off brazil two years ago, killing everyone on board.
